nodes.text: Serjil Javis was a male Human who was a son of Karrels Javis, a lieutenant of Suudaa Nem'ro. In 3643 BBY, Serjil and his brother Vargai encountered a Sith apprentice in Imperial space and a dispute broke out. The Sith killed Serjil and crippled Vargai, and the incident disrupted an Imperial Intelligence operation involving Karrels Javis, resulting in Karrels's death shortly after learning what happened.
